name: Resilient Community Networking
description: Building decentralized communities with strong support structures that withstand external control mechanisms.

cards.title: Establishing Secure and Autonomous Communities
cards.description: Structuring independent societies that resist external control.
bulletpoints: Creating self-governing models that rely on decentralized decision-making.
Identifying land and location strategies for sustainable parallel societies.
Establishing secure internal communications and encrypted data-sharing.
cards.summaryText: Design decentralized settlements with strategic locations and encrypted community communications.

cards.title: Defensive Social Engineering for Community Protection
cards.description: Preventing infiltration and manipulation within alternative societies.
bulletpoints: Implementing community vetting processes to prevent subversion.
Using social dynamics and group psychology for cohesion and resilience.
Creating counter-disinformation mechanisms to protect group integrity.
cards.summaryText: Vet members thoroughly, reinforce cohesion psychology, and neutralize disinformation threats.

cards.title: Decentralized Governance and Conflict Resolution
cards.description: Developing self-regulating systems to manage disputes and maintain order.
bulletpoints: Implementing reputation-based governance to prevent authoritarian control.
Using blockchain and smart contracts for automated legal structures.
Creating non-hierarchical power structures for true autonomy.
cards.summaryText: Run reputation-driven governance, codify rules with smart contracts, and sustain non-hierarchical autonomy.
